title: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Berdychi, Umanske, Netaylove, Nevelske of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conduc...
content: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Berdychi, Umanske, Netaylove, Nevelske of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Novobakhmutivka, Berdychi, Orlivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
